questions.template: {player1} picks someone to drink 2 penalties!
The player reading this card must take 3 penalties!
Chicks! All girls drink!
Floor! Last person to point to the floor must take a penalty!
Guys! All guys drink!
Heaven! Last person to point to the sky must take a penalty!
Rhyme! Go around the group rhyming with the word chosen by {player1}. First to fail or repeat drinks!
Question Time! {player1} has to ask {player2} a question. If they don't answer, they take a maximum penalty. If they answer, {player1} takes a maximum penalty!
Categories! {player1} picks a category (e.g., car brands). Go around the group naming items. First to hesitate or repeat drinks!
The player on aux must take 3 drinks
Waterfall! {player1} starts, and everyone must start drinking. You can't stop until the person before you stops!
Song Showdown! {player1} and {player2} must pick a song to play. Group votes on the best song. Loser drinks 3 times!
European countries. If you repeat, or can't think of one, take a penalty. {player1}, you start
Photo Shoot! {player1} must pose for a photo. Refusing to participate means taking a maximum penalty
Everyone taller than {playe1}, take a penalty for each extra inch
Thumb Master! {player1} is now the thumb master - whenever they put their thumb on the table, last person to do so drinks!
Social! Everyone drinks!
Player with the most facial hair must take 3 penalties
On count of 3, everyone looks at someone. If they look back at you, both drink!
The player with the most screentime on Instagram must take 3 penalties, the player with the least give out 3 penalties
The player who's been single the longest, give out 2 penalties
{player1} take a penalty from {player2}
Spelling Bee! {player1} gives {player2} a word to spell backwards. Wrong spelling means drinking!
Players who didn't vote in the last election give out 4 penalties
{player1} like the first 15 posts you find on Instagram, or take 3 penalties
{player1} and {player2} have to agree on one player to give 4 penalties to
Players who have known each other for more than 6 years take 3 penalties together
{player1} tell {player2} to take as many penalties as you want
Business students, take 4 penalties
Guys take as many penalties as there are hot girls in the room
Girls take as many penalties as there are hot guys in the room
{player1} say something you've done. If nobody else has, everyone else drinks. If others have, you drink together
Take 2 penalties if you've ever been to disneyland
Couples in the group give out 3 penalties, if there are none everyone drinks
{player1} give 3 penalties if you've ever been broken up with. If not, take 3 penalties
{player1} give 3 penalties to a player who's tanner than you... If there are none, you take them
All players that have a vape with them take 3 penalties
The last person to have been in a fight take 2 penalties
Take 3 penalties if you've ever lived in a foreign country
Word Association! {player1} says a word, go around making associations. Hesitation or repeat means drinking!
If you've ever been on vacation with {player1}, give out 2 penalties. If not, take them
Players with the emptiest drink take 3 penalties
Take 2 penalties if you've ever been in a relationship with someone in this room
Players who've been to a festival this year take 3 penalties
Take 2 penalties if you've ever been on a blind date
Everyone who's been to Trinity Ball take 2 penalties
Take 3 penalties if you've ever been kicked out of a club
{player1} give out 3 penalties if you've ever ghosted someone... If not, take them yourself
Players who've ever been on a holiday romance take 3 penalties
Players who've had a one night stand take 2 penalties
Take 3 penalties if you've ever slid into someone's DMs
{player1} give 2 penalties to the person you think is most likely to get married first
Give 3 penalties if you have a dating app on your phone
